IMG_1472.title: 1 Bed Flat, Peterculter
IMG_1472.bio: This is a 1 bed flat situated at the center of Peterculter. It has 1 bedroom (with ensuite), 1 bathroom, living room, dining room and a spacious kitchen.

IMG_1176_portrait.title: 4 bedroom house, Rubislaw Den South
IMG_1176_portrait.bio: A small snapshot from a beautiful 4 bedroom house, situated in Rubislaw Den South, Aberdeen. Here, we see a fraction of the light and expansive kitchen/eating area.
